name: CVE-2022-23806
description: Curve.IsOnCurve in crypto/elliptic in Go before 1.16.14 and 1.17.x before 1.17.7 can incorrectly return true in situations with a big.Int value that is not a valid field element.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:golang:go:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:golang:go:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:storagegrid:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:cloud_insights_telegraf_agent:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:kubernetes_monitoring_operator:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:beegfs_csi_driver:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
